title: Tech Moves: USAFacts picks Microsoft and Amazon vet as CTO; Inventprise names CEO; RealNetworks appoints KONTXT president - GeekWire
content: Tech Moves: USAFacts picks Microsoft and Amazon vet as CTO; Inventprise names CEO; RealNetworks appoints KONTXT president  GeekWire
description: — Tanuja Korlepra, a former Amazon and Microsoft product management leader, has been named chief technology officer of USAFacts, the Bellevue, Wash.-based nonpartisan civic data initiative founded by…
